summary: This module provides utilities for interacting with the Hugging Face Hub, centered around a mixin that equips diffusion models, schedulers, and pipelines with the ability to prepare their files and push them to a remote repository. It includes helper routines for handling checkpoint shards, extracting commit hashes, constructing HTTP user agents, and generating or updating model cards, though many of these helpers are currently unused.
business_intent: Enable developers to easily publish and version diffusion model artifacts on the Hugging Face Hub, streamlining the sharing, documentation, and distribution of models and related components.
